all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And in all his journeyings let him lift up his voice as with the sound of a trump, and warn the inhabitants of the earth to flee the wrath to come.
Doctrine and Covenants 124:106
Quote of the Day
"In order to gain or grow a testimony, sacrifices will have to be made."
Elder Hans T. Boom | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
